l10n_text_explanation1.en: This is where you find the tools needed when using Confusa. These tools will not help you obtain certificates in one step, but they will ease the work.

l10n_text_explanation2.en: Tool for creating key, CSR and general filetransfer with the server. This can be downloaded either directly through the browser, or, you can receive it via email.

l10n_text_explanation3.en: Note this is a strictly personal script, and it is tailored to your user-credentials. This means that you cannot use someone else's script, nor they yours.
